sense.def:
To speak
pomeni uporabiti glas, da izrečemo besede.

seg.quote: She spoke with an Irish accent.
Mary turned her head to speak to him.
He hadn't been able to speak of what had happened.
...a robot capable of understanding spoken commands.

sense.def:
To speak a foreign language
pomeni obvladati tuj jezik in ga biti spodoben uporabljati.

To speak well or badly of someone
pomeni reči dobre ali slabe stvari o nekom.

seg.quote: The students spoke highly of their history lecturer.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
so to speak
pokažemo, da tisto, kar govorimo, ni dobesedno res.

seg.quote: He goes to work early; before the office is awake, so to speak.

sense.def:
Z izrazi kot
generally speaking
in
technically speaking
pokažemo, kakšne vrste je naša izjava.

seg.quote: America is still, generally speaking, the most technologically advanced country.
Roughly speaking, there are two possibilities.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
speaking of
uvedemo novo témo pogovora, na katero nas napeljuje pravkar uporabljena beseda ali izraz.

seg.quote: It's nice to have an admirer who gives nothing away. Speaking of giving away, I have brought you a present.

sense.def:
Izraza
nobody to speak of
ali
nothing to speak of
pomenita skoraj nihče ali nič ali pa samo nepomembne osebe ali stvari.

seg.quote: ‘Did you find anything?’—‘No, nothing to speak of.’

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
are not on speaking terms
, nikoli ne govorijo drug z drugim.

To speak one's mind on something
pomeni povedati natančno tako, kot mislimo o nečem.

Kadar nekaj
speaks for itself
, so lastnosti ali pomen tistega tako očitne, da jih ni treba pojasnjevati ali nanje opozarjati.

To speak for a group of people
pomeni pojasniti mnenje skupine ljudi.

seg.quote: I'm only speaking for myself, not for my colleagues.

sense.def:
To speak out in favour of something or against something
pomeni javno povedati, da mislimo, da je nekaj dobro ali slabo.

seg.quote: He spoke out against racial discrimination many times.

sense.def:
Izraz
speak up
uporabimo, kadar nekoga prosimo, naj govori glasneje.
